title: PM strongly condemns attack on Ayaz Amir
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 1 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday strongly condemned the attack on senior journalist and analyst Ayaz Amir.
He instructed the chief minister Punjab to hold a high-level investigation into the incident and bring the culprits to justice.
The PM expressed sympathy with Ayaz Amir and directed that protection of the journalists should be ensured.
